nodes.text: Leisure and Recreation was a division of the Mekuun Corporation that produced the Little Mynock Airscooter. The product was popular across the galaxy, being many parents' first choice for their youngling's first speeder.

The Leisure and Recreation division of Mekuun Corporation was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that opened to guests on May 31, 2019 at Disneyland Park. The division can be mentioned by staff when describing the Little Mynock Airscooter.
